newsitem.title: USA: Transaction Systems buys Banksiel unit.
newsitem.headline: Transaction Systems buys Banksiel unit.

text.p: Transaction Systems Architects Inc said Tuesday it completed its acquisition of the software and services division of Banksiel SpA in Naples, Italy.
Transaction Systems said the unit provides application software and services for financial institutions and will market and support electronic funds transfer software developed by its new parent.
The company said Banksiel is owned by a division of the Institute for Industrial Reconstruction, an Italian government-owned holding company.
Transaction Systems develops software used to process credit card, debit card and home banking transactions.
Its shares closed down 3/8 Tuesday at 28-1/2.
